registerMessage: Please choose your country code and enter your mobile number to get the verification code.
agree: By clicking continue you agree to MirrorFly

noCallLogsContent: Any new calls will appear here

youWantDeleteStatus: Do you want to delete the status?

holdToRecord: Hold for Video, tap for photo
last5Message: The last 5 messages from this contact will be forwarded to admin. This Contact will not be notified.
reportThisGroupContent: The last 5 messages from this group will be forwarded to admin. No one in this group will be notified.
deletingYourAccountDescription3: Delete you from all of your MirrorFly groups

feedbackDesc: We will store your feedback for future purpose

titleContactMsg: Mirror Fly is a ready-to-go messaging solution for building enterprise-grade real-time chat IM applications that meet various degrees of requirements like team discussion, data sharing, task delegation and information handling on the go.
titleContactMsgTime: To have a detailed interaction with our experts
titleFaqMsg: Kindly checkout FAQ section for doubts regarding Mirror fly. We might have already answered your question.
title: Title.
pinLockDesc: Add more security with 4 digit secret PIN
sentOTP: Sending OTP to your Mobile Number
forgetPinOTPText: Generate OTP to your registered mobile number
sentOtpSuccess: We have sent you the OTP to the registered mobile number enter the 6 digit verification code below
fingerPrintIDDesc: Enable Fingerprint to unlock the app
appLockDesc: If App Lock enabled, the app will be locked automatically after 32 sec when it is not in use.
appLockNote: Note: Once a PIN is set, it will be expired in 31 days and has to be renewed.
autoDownloadLabel: Enable “Auto download” to turn all types of files received readily viewable
dataUsageSettingsLabel: Setup your mobile and wifi data usage based on media type
archiveSettingDec: Archived chats will remain archived when you receive a new message
lastSeenDec: Hiding the last seen activity to other users
googleTranslationMessage: Enable Translate Message to choose Translation Language
googleTranslationLanguageDoubleTap: Double Tap the received messages to translate

youMayNotProperApp: you may not have proper app to view this content

smsContent:
Hey, MirrorFly is a real time chat, Audio and Video call solution for B2B and B2C.
 Download the app from this URL: https://app.mirrorfly.com
messageUnavailable: The Original Message is not Available
mobileNumberNotMatch: The mobile number you entered doesn't match your account
proceedDeleteAccountContent: Deleting your account is permanent. Your data cannot be recovered if you reactivate your MirrorFly account in future.
accountDeleted: Your MirrorFly account has been deleted
deleteReasons: I am changing my phone number
confirmPinMust: Confirm PIN must be of 4 digits
pinMustSame: PIN and Confirm PIN must be same
oldNewPinSame: Old PIN and new PIN should not be same
pinShouldNotPrevious: PIN should not be same as immediate previous PIN
needToSetPin: You need to set pin first in order to enable bio metric authentication
maximumLoginReached: You have reached the maximum device limit, If you want to continue one of your device will logged out . Do you want to continue?
deviceConfirmation: You have logged-in another device. Do you want to continue here?
pleaseEnterValidMobileWithCode: Please enter a valid mobile number with country code
unableConnectServer: Unable to Connect to Server. Please login Again
unableToLoadProfileData: Unable to load profile data, please login again
errorWhileAddingMember: Error while adding Members in this group
errorWhileMakeAdmin: Error while make admin this member
invalidPINGenerateOTP: Invalid PIN, Generate OTP to your registered mobile number
pinExpiredIn: Your PIN will be expired in %d day(s)
plsSetNewPIN: Your current PIN has been expired. Please set a new PIN to continue further
toDisablePIN: Enter Current Pin To Disable Pin And FingerPrint
areYouClearAllChat: Are you sure want to clear your conversation history?
serverError: Server error, kindly try again later
audioPermissionContent: To send audio messages, allow MirrorFly access to your Microphone.
microPhonePermissionDeniedContent: MirrorFly need the Microphone Permission in order to send audio messages, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Microphone".
cameraPermissionContent: To capture photos and video, allow MirrorFly access to the camera and microphone.
cameraPermissionDeniedContent: MirrorFly need the Camera and Storage Permission in order to capture photos and video, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Camera" and "Storage".
cameraCapturePermanentlyDeniedContent: MirrorFly need the Camera and Microphone Permission in order to capture photos and video, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Camera" and "Microphone".
filePermissionContent: To send media, allow MirrorFly access to your device's photos,media, and files.
storagePermissionDeniedContent: MirrorFly need the Storage Permission in order to attach photos, media, and files, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Storage".
contactPermissionContent: To help you connect with friends and family, allow Mirrorfly access to your contacts.
contactPermissionDeniedContent: MirrorFly need the Contacts Permission in order to help you connect with friends and family, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Contacts"
locationPermissionContent: MirrorFly needs access to your location in order to share your current location.
locationPermissionDeniedContent: MirrorFly need the Location Permission in order to attach a location, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Location".
contactSyncPermissionContent: MirrorFly will continuously upload your contacts to its encrypted servers to let you discover and connect with your friends. Your contacts are uploaded using MirrorFly private contact discovery which means they are end-to-end encrypted and secured.
writeStoragePermissionContent: To download media, allow MirrorFly access to your device's storage.
writeStoragePermissionDeniedContent: MirrorFly need the Storage Permission in order to download photos, media, and files, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Storage".
audioCallPermissionDeniedContent: MirrorFly need the Microphone Permission in order to call Family, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Microphone".
videoCallPermissionDeniedContent: MirrorFly need the Microphone and Camera Permissions in order to call Family, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Microphone" and "Camera".
permissionContent: MirrorFly need the %d Permission. But they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "%s"
notificationPermissionMessageContent:
Allow MirrorFly to send you notifications to stay 
connected with friends and family.

 Please continue to app Settings > select Permission > enable Notification.
callPermissionContent: MirrorFly need the %d Permissions in order to call Family
callPermissionDeniedContent: MirrorFly need the %d Permissions in order to call Family, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable %d.
videoCallPermissionContent: MirrorFly need the Microphone and Camera Permissions in order to call Family
createNewMeetingSubtitle: Share a link for your Mirrorfly meet
copyTheLink: Copy the link or click to join the meeting
meetDescription: Anyone with Mirror Fly can use this link to join this call. only share it with people you trust
wentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again
couldNotProcess: Couldn't process the link. Please try again.
